actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To eliminate customs user fees on goods originating in the State of Israel.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1985 to eliminate customs user fees on goods originating in Israel. Prohibits any customs service exempt from such fees from being funded with money from the Customs User Fee Account.

titles.title: To eliminate customs user fees on goods originating in the State of Israel.
